content.html: Stop watching The Crown and go watch some History Channel documentaries, and those made by the local people. Start from the dark ages and work your way up through World Wars I and II and into the 60s. At no point in history has the British empire been romantic and inspiring.
content.value:
Stop watching The Crown and go watch some History Channel documentaries, and those made by the local people. Start from the dark ages and work your way up through World Wars I and II and into the 60s. 
At no point in history has the British empire been romantic and inspiring.
